Text: Dave Lyman Cc Dave is my brotherinlaw and a very solid and talented individual I would not hesitate to recommend him if you know of any appropriate employment Feel free to contact him directly or if you prefer let me know of any leads you may have Thanks Mike Original Message From David Lyman mailto Sent Monday May PM To Subject info Mike Im interested in Senior Project Management or Project Management positions in software development or technical consulting Im very flexible on location but would prefer SF peninsula or upper East Bay Any help would be much appreciated Thanks Dave DavidLymanResumedoc
Great partyweekend overall Thanks for inviting us Jeff we had a really good time and thouroughly enjoyed oursleves the entire time Hopefully well get a chance to reciprocate soon Best Mike

er ticketsIf you are interested in Niners tickets I have the following I can get for cost Panthers Lions Bills Eagles seats in section lower deck row under the overhang each Rams Eagles seats in upper reserved row each Let me know Lisa please forward to your friends

Herrings in UtahYou may have heard it may be a surprise Were making a move and were hoping its wise It was hard to decide to go or to stay But MyFamilycom has lured us away It is a pretty cool gig as far as dotcoms go The only catch is that its based in Provo No not Provo Spain as some might guess The Provo in Utah where they drink much less The land of mountains and rivers and BYU And of course the Olympics of So please come and see us whenever you can Well have plenty of bedrooms and a whole lot of land Well snowboard and ski well hike and well bike See you in Utah TJ Theo Lisa and Mike The Herring Family North Country Manor Lane Alpine Utah After November
